revised_title: The Impact of Pesticides on Marine Ecosystems and Estuarine Fauna
tldr: This article discusses the biological effects of pollution in the sea, specifically the influence of pesticides on marine ecosystems and estuarine fauna. The author highlights the importance of understanding the toxicity of pesticides to estuarine animals and the potential consequences of long-term exposure to sublethal amounts of pesticides. The article also describes a bioassay program that evaluates the toxicity of pesticides to estuarine fauna and the development of techniques for assessing pesticide pollution in estuaries on a national scale.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Marine Ecology
